body_html:
@adrienchaton what version of pytorch are you on: print(torch.__version__). Make sure you are atleast on 0.3.

About nn.utils.weight_norm, can you give a small test program (<100 lines) that can reproduce the issue? we can take a look

body:
@adrienchaton what version of pytorch are you on: `print(torch.__version__)`. Make sure you are atleast on `0.3`.

About `nn.utils.weight_norm`, can you give a small test program (<100 lines) that can reproduce the issue? we can take a look
